elements.title: Un día de vida (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that although the 1950 Mexican film Un día de vida (pamphlet pictured) bombed with domestic audiences, it became a classic in Yugoslavia?

elements.title: The Sims 2: FreeTime (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that They Might Be Giants sang in Simlish on the soundtrack for The Sims 2: FreeTime?

elements.title: Catherine Wedd (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that when she was elected to the New Zealand parliament, Catherine Wedd defeated her former coworker at a marketing company?

elements.title: Seabury Tredwell House (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Seabury Tredwell House, now a museum, is Manhattan's only remaining 19th-century house with its original furnishings?

elements.title: Aineta aryballos (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that scholars have argued over whether the Aineta aryballos depicts a goddess, a dancer, or a prostitute?

elements.title: Smin Ye-Thin-Yan (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Hanthawaddy commander Smin Ye-Thin-Yan captured Donwun by deceiving his blood brother?

elements.title: French bread (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that French bread is not from France?
